channel.title: [Help] Ranging And Mage Clipping
channel.description: Ok so i cast a spell or i attack with a bow on, and the char hits the npc through walls without moving or then npc moving, the npc faces the direction of the player but i want it to run to the npc untill a clear shot is in range (no walls or objects blocking the attack) then the char casts the attack... can someone give me a small tutorial (not asking for the code, i want to learn :) ) or demonstration on how i would do this?

item.title: [Help] Ranging And Mage Clipping
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
